title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements for the AIStructuralAnalyzer tool. This includes gathering input from stakeholders (architects, engineers, building inspectors, construction companies, etc.) to understand their needs, pain points, and existing workflows. Research existing solutions, industry standards/regulations (e.g., building codes, safety guidelines), and relevant AI/ML techniques for structural analysis. Identify key features, functionalities, and performance requirements (e.g., accuracy, speed, scalability). Outline the overall system architecture, including the AI/ML components (e.g., computer vision, structural analysis models), user interface (e.g., CAD integration, reporting), data storage (e.g., building designs, analysis results), and integration with external systems (e.g., CAD software, building codes databases, construction management tools). Develop a project plan with milestones, timelines, resource estimates, and risk management strategies.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, integration points, and key considerations such as scalability, performance, security, and maintainability.

title: Data Modeling and Database Design
description: Design the database schema and data structures to store building designs and analysis results.

title: AI Model Development
description: Develop and train the AI models for structural analysis and code compliance checking.

title: User Interface Design and Development
description: Design and develop the user interface for uploading building designs and viewing analysis results.

title: Backend Development
description: Develop the backend services for processing building designs, running AI analysis, and managing data.

title: Integration and Testing
description: Integrate the frontend, backend, and AI components, and perform comprehensive testing.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the system adheres to security best practices and relevant compliance regulations.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment infrastructure and automate the deployment process.

title: Documentation and User Training
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and training materials for users and administrators.
